title: Play Recording Block
body:
Play Recording Block¶

The Play Recording block is only available when designing a workflow for a voice campaign or when managing a workflow for a phone number .
This block allows you to create a more personal experience for the recipients of your call - who will hear a unique message from a pre-recorded human voice.
To use this block, you will need to have navigated to the workflow design tab. Click here if you are having trouble reaching this point.

  1. Place a Play Recording block in your workflow where desired

  2. Click Choose or record an audio file

  3. You can either upload an existing audio file or record your own with one of the two options below

    • Microphone

    • Phone Call

  4. To hear your audio recording, click show more and Play recording
